docs.lead_paragraph: NEW YORK Harbor Freight Tunnel Proposal In his State of the City speech, Mayor Giuliani proposed building a tunnel beneath New York Harbor to carry rail freight between the water-fringed city and the rest of the country, and said the city would study transforming the weed-strewn waterfronts of Brooklyn and Staten Island into a hub port for a new generation of deep-hulled ships. $(Page A1.$)

docs.lead_paragraph: I HAVE been asked repeatedly in the last two months about my knees and whether the arthritis remedy I mentioned in a column on alternative medicine was actually working. It is a combination of glucosamine and chondroitin sulfate, natural substances that are centrally involved in the formation of the cartilage that caps the ends of bones. Deterioration of this articular cartilage and resulting abnormalities in the surrounding bone cause the stiffness, pain, crackling sounds and sometimes swelling of joints that are the hallmarks of osteoarthritis, the wear-and-tear form of arthritis that afflicts 16 million Americans.
docs.abstract: Jane E Brody column on combination of glucosamine and chondroitin sulfate as a possible means of restoring damaged cartilage associated with osteoarthritis; says they worked for her arthritic dog and appear to be helping her with her arthritic knees; notes that treatment has been found effective in European studies and that American researchers are now putting it to well-designed human trials; drawing (M)
